attributes.action: Re assess the gym/fitness studio closure during lockdown periods
attributes.additional_details: This needs to happen  so the public have a sanctuary to enable maximum physical and mental wellbeing during this awful time. Obviously enforcing maximum sanitation and track and trace needs to be enforced. The gyms are needed by so many and for some the only safehaven available. The nhs is already under intense strain and the decision on gym closure will only intensify this. Please re consider.
attributes.background: To re think the social impact of the closure of fitness suites, gyms and martial arts premises. This needs to be done if you assess the impact on us as a society that is already highly in jeopardy in regards to mental and physical health

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
